definitions.definition: A noisy boaster ; a swaggering fellow.
A dry , thin , crispy baked bread (usually salty or savoury , but sometimes sweet, as in the case of graham crackers and animal crackers ).

The final section of certain whips, which is made of a short, thin piece of unravelled rope, or which is a short piece of twisted string tied to the end of the whip , which produces a distinctive cracking sound when the whip is cracked .
A northern pintail , a dabbling duck of species Anas acuta .
A person or thing that breaks a thing (e.g., nutcracker ).
examples: a lobster and crab shell cracker

subdefinitions.definition: Refinery equipment used to pyrolyse organic feedstocks. If catalyst is used to aid pyrolysis it is informally called a cat-cracker
A pair of fluted rolls for grinding caoutchouc .
One who cracks (i.e. overcomes) computer software or security restrictions.

definitions.definition: A fine , great thing or person ( crackerjack ).
definitions.label_groups: slang , chiefly British , Ireland , Australia , New Zealand

definitions.definition: An ambitious or hard-working person (i.e. someone who arises at the 'crack' of dawn).
An impoverished white person from the southeastern United States , originally associated with Georgia and parts of Florida ; ( by extension ) any white person (slang).

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A noisy boaster ; a swaggering fellow.
secondary_definitions: A dry , thin , crispy baked bread (usually salty or savoury , but sometimes sweet, as in the case of graham crackers and animal crackers ).

The final section of certain whips, which is made of a short, thin piece of unravelled rope, or which is a short piece of twisted string tied to the end of the whip , which produces a distinctive cracking sound when the whip is cracked .
( UK ) A northern pintail , a dabbling duck of species Anas acuta .
A person or thing that breaks a thing (e.g., nutcracker ).
( slang , chiefly British , Ireland , Australia , New Zealand ) A fine , great thing or person ( crackerjack ).
( Discuss this sense) An ambitious or hard-working person (i.e. someone who arises at the 'crack' of dawn).

( US , derogatory , ethnic slur , offensive ) An impoverished white person from the southeastern United States , originally associated with Georgia and parts of Florida ; ( by extension ) any white person (slang).
